body: hi I have uploaded my file. My energy plus simulation file is not running. I got a warning massage that EP component is running only in meters. how can I change the components in meter and how do I know what dimension they are using.I have been trying for a log time to get the energy simulation but it is not working at all. I have updated all the HB and LB component. Can anybody please help me to figure out the problem. Thanks. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UjLFZWxAkgpWUqCCxdAqosHsmQseGnCCdTl4tywZm6NHmOucwBMrtAR-x20ayxgxXyo5xNwwsUGqN5OQx41rPXuqZrkV7HC1/Capture9.PNG)

attachments.name: 6 - Running a Basic Energy Simulation by krk.gh

topic: waringi msg:1. Currently the EnergyPlus component only works in meters. Change the units to Meters and try again!

replies.body:
What unitss are you using in your rhino file?

-A.
Thank you Abraham for your reply.I don't know. how do I know that and how to change them.
thank you very much Bao. It is working now. thanks again.
You can always check it here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EqXI2*bZ158gX*vzn0O0n6TY3ts*iF2wUSfdVxYrt63l2tCOuZ6DZj9B4-hLwfDYurDhDgR93jEUv*mxD8N-1sIOkj75gKUd/Capture.PNG)
